title: Dr. Slump Movie 08: Arale-chan Hoyoyo!! Tasuketa Same ni Tsurerarete...
synopsis: Arale saves a baby shark at the beach and in gratitude the sharks invite she and her family to visit the Underwater Kingdom.
staff: [["Koorogi '73", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Takashima, Akihiko', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Toriyama, Akira', ['Original Creator']], ['Kikuchi, Shunsuke', ['Music']]]
